name: Emerillon
area: Southern border area, Ouaqui, Camopi and Oiapoque rivers. None in Brazil.

country.name: French Guiana
country.introduction: French Guiana is an overseas department of France on the northeast coast of South America composed mainly of tropical rainforest. The ruins of 17th-century Fort Cépérou overlook the capital Cayenne with its colorful Creole houses and street markets. Shops and cafes surround the palm-filled main square Place des Palmistes. The Rémire-Montjoly suburb is lined with Atlantic coast beaches.
